remarks:
Restricted quantifier version of Theorem 19.3 of [Margaris] p. 89.  We don't need the nonempty class condition of ~ r19.3rzv when there is an outer quantifier.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Oct-2012.)

 Restricted quantifier version of Theorem 19.3 of [Margaris] p. 89. (Contributed by NM, 25-Oct-2012.)
statement:
rr19.3v $p |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. A ph <-> A. x e. A ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
